name: momentum-platform
description: Momentum Platform — SaaS de automação financeira inteligente (AI + Voice + Vision)

scripts.build:all: npm run functions:build && npm --prefix web run build
scripts.verify:functions: cd functions && npm run lint:imports && npm test -- --runInBand --detectOpenHandles && npm run build && node ../tools/check-functions-build-aliases.js
scripts.verify:web: cd web && npm run lint:api-headers && npm run build && npm run test:headers --if-present
scripts.verify: npm run verify:functions && npm run verify:web
scripts.ci:functions: npm --prefix functions ci && npm run verify:functions
scripts.ci:web: npm --prefix web ci && npm run lint:api-headers && npm run verify:web
scripts.ci:all: npm run ci:functions && npm run ci:web
